articles.title: South Africa v. Israel: ICJ orders protection measures to Palestinians in Gaza - Bar & Bench - Indian Legal News
articles.description: The International Court of Justice (ICJ) at Hague on Friday issued a series of provisional measures to protect the rights of Palestinians in the Gaza Strip afte
articles.content: In a separate opinion, ad hoc Judge Barak expressed doubts over whether South Africa had brought its dispute in good faith given that it declined to accept an offer from Israel to engage in consultat… [+1649 chars]
